tool_description:
Comprehensive source of UK Travel Money Currency Data.
Continually updated rates information on 40+ Currency Merchants and up to 70+ currencies per merchant. Ideal for Travel Money comparison and holiday websites
name: UK Travel Money Currency Rates
title: UK Travel Money Currency Rates

api_list.name: Get Info
api_list.description: Returns information on the currencies that are available and the merchants that currency data is available from.

required_parameters.name: action
required_parameters.description: Information on currencies available (CUR), merchant list (MER) or both (ALL)

api_list.name: Get Rates
api_list.description: Get rates data on a particular currency using it's ISO code. Rates are updated every 10 minutes. Some currencies may return 0 results because no merchants have rates for them.

required_parameters.name: OrderedBy
required_parameters.description: Method of ordering rates data (Descending & Ascending by value or Alpha A to Z & Z to A by merchant name):
